name: Avīci hell
description:
In October 1973, Ingrid Olderck entered DINA with the rank of lieutenant and joined the institution's women's school, where some 70 women were tortured and repressed as opponents of the military dictatorship. In 1974, DINA created the first detention centres, including Venda Sexy, where Ingrid was tortured and raped using a dog named "Volodya".

She trained her dog "Volodya" to commit violent and sexual violence against political prisoners, both male and female. Later, she left the intelligence agency for unknown reasons, and she was assassinated shortly after and was shot in the brain, but she did not die strangely. She was later brought to court for her atrocities, but she said she was shot in the brain and lost her memory, so she went unpunished. The bullet in this person's brain has never been removed, and finally died of health problems at the age of 57, and has not been punished.

”Avīci hell“is one of the hells (Naraka) in Hinduism and Buddhism, In Buddhism, it is the lowest level of the Naraka or "hell" realm, with the most suffering, into which the dead who have committed grave misdeeds may be reborn.

Her relationship with the dog, her body, her fears and her frustrations reveal a deep division between her and the country. I made this game as a satire of her and as an exploration of human rights.
